title: (x) Bauhaus sans-like Juniper Development Group logo - Helvetica (customised) {Yves}
content:
Hey Everyone,

Haven't had any luck finding out what this is. I really like it. It's from:  
 [http://juniper.com.au/](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307083948/http:/juniper.com.au/ "http://juniper.com.au/")

Any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307083948/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_21.png) | 7.97 KB |
author: Trevor Curtis

comments.content:
This is Helvetica, customised by somebody who obviously knew what he/she was doing.

If you'd like a similar type of font, try [House Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20140307083948/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts).
I noticed the similar dimensions to Helvetica, but assumed it must be something new I was unaware of. There's some variations of Chalet that are very similar. Thanks for your quick response!
